item.title: 苹果宣布「Mini Apps」计划：小程序正式纳入 iOS 体系
item.guid: 苹果宣布「Mini-Apps」计划：小程序正式纳入-iOS-体系
item.description:
Early this morning, Apple officially announced the "Mini Apps Partner Program," marking the first time mini-programs have entered the iOS ecosystem as a standardized, compliant application form. This program provides developers with new monetization paths and brings mini-programs under Apple's regulatory framework. 今日凌晨，苹果正式宣布「Mini Apps 合作伙伴计划」，标志着小程序首次进入 iOS 体系，成为制度化的合规应用形态。该计划为开发者提供新的商业化路径，并将小程序纳入苹果监管框架。

Apple stated that Mini Apps are "self-contained experiences built on web technologies such as HTML5 and JavaScript," distributed within "host Apps," and accessible without installation. 苹果表示， 小程序（Mini Apps）是「基于 Web 技术如 HTML5 和 JavaScript 构建的自包含体验」，分发于「宿主 App」内，无需安装即可访问。

Host Apps must support both iOS and iPadOS, and utilize the "Advanced Commerce API" and "Declared Age Range API" to ensure payment transparency, content compliance, and age-appropriate access. 宿主 App 必须同时支持 iOS 与 iPadOS，并采用「Advanced Commerce API」（高级商务 API）和「Declared Age Range API」，以确保支付透明、内容合规及适龄访问。

Notably, eligible developers can enjoy a 15% cut of digital goods revenue, a significant reduction compared to the 30% rate for traditional in-app purchases. Apple emphasized that this offer is independent of developer size and applies to all qualified transactions. 值得注意的是， 符合要求的开发者可享受数字商品收入 15% 的抽成，相比传统 App 内购的 30% 费率大幅降低。 苹果强调，该优惠与开发者规模无关，所有合格交易均适用。

Furthermore, according to Bloomberg, Apple and Tencent have reached an agreement that future in-app purchases for WeChat mini-programs and mini-games will be handled by Apple, with a unified 15% revenue share. 此外，据彭博社报道， 苹果与腾讯已达成协议，未来微信小程序与小游戏的内购支付将由苹果处理，并统一收取 15% 的分成。

This move concludes a year-long negotiation and disagreement between the two parties, and also signifies a major adjustment in Apple's app ecosystem strategy in the Chinese market. 这一举措结束了双方长达一年的谈判与分歧，也标志着苹果在中国市场的应用生态策略出现重大调整。

During yesterday's Q3 2025 earnings call, Tencent President Martin Lau responded to this matter. 在昨天的 2025 年第三季度财报电话会上，腾讯总裁刘炽平就此事进行了回应。

He stated that Tencent and Apple have a very good relationship and have cooperated in many aspects. Tencent and Apple have been discussing how to make the mini-game ecosystem more active, and "I think there might be a formal approval at some point." 他表示，腾讯与苹果有着非常好的关系，在很多方面都进行了合作。腾讯和苹果一直在讨论如何使小游戏生态更活跃，「我想在某个时候可能会有一个正式的批准」。

Industry analysis suggests that this move is both a response to the EU's Digital Markets Act (DMA) and Apple's proactive adjustment in response to the global trend of super app platforms. Through mini-programs, Apple provides developers with lower-cost distribution channels while maintaining payment and review control. 业内分析认为，此举既是对欧盟《数字市场法案》(DMA) 的回应，也是苹果在全球超级 App 平台化趋势下的主动调整。通过小程序，苹果在保持支付与审核控制的同时，为开发者提供更低成本的分发渠道。

Furthermore, Apple pointed out that the lightweight nature of mini-programs will become an important capability unit for future AI scheduling, facilitating calls by system-level intelligent assistants for rapid task execution. Mini-games, utility services, and lightweight functional closed loops are expected to usher in new growth opportunities. 此外，苹果指出，小程序的轻量特征将成为未来 AI 调度的重要能力单元，便于系统级智能助手调用，实现快速任务执行。小游戏、工具类服务及轻量功能闭环预计将迎来新的增长机会。

Apple noted that this will be another important developer support initiative, following the Small Business Program, Video Partner Program, and News Partner Program. 苹果指出，这将成为继小型企业计划、视频合作伙伴计划和新闻合作伙伴计划之后的又一重要开发者支持举措。

item.title: 苹果向开发者推送 iOS 26.2 beta 2：液态玻璃动效改进
item.guid: 苹果向开发者推送-iOS-26.2-beta-2：液态玻璃动效改进
item.description:
Early yesterday morning, Apple officially pushed the iOS 26.2 beta 2 internal test version "23C5033h". The specific update contents are summarized as follows: 昨天凌晨，苹果正式推送 iOS 26.2 beta 2 内测版本「23C5033h」。具体更新内容整理如下：

    Menu and secondary interface pop-up animation liquid glass effect adjusted; the new animation is smoother and more natural, closer to the WWDC25 demonstration effect;

    Rangefinder, lock screen "Clear All Notifications" button, level app, and clock transparency slider now feature a liquid glass effect;

    Game Library adds sorting and filtering options, supporting controller navigation; users can directly invite friends to challenges within the "Games" app and receive notifications when high scores are broken;

    Podcasts and Reminders: The Podcast app's automatically generated chapters now include an "AI Generated" label; the "Urgent" option in Reminders is now displayed side-by-side;

    CarPlay settings allow disabling the Messages "Pinned Conversations" feature to prevent automatic iPhone message synchronization;

    Health features: The highest sleep score level has been changed from "Excellent" to "Very High," and the scoring threshold is stricter.

On the same day, Apple also pushed macOS, iPadOS, watchOS, visionOS, and tvOS 26.2 to developers. Regarding the official release time, 9to5Mac reported that iOS 26.2 will be officially rolled out to the general public in December. 同日，苹果还向开发者推送了 macOS、iPadOS、watchOS、visionOS 和 tvOS 26.2。正式版推送时间方面，据 9to5Mac 报道，iOS 26.2 将于 12 月正式向大众用户推送。

item.title: 超雪团队成功实现 iPhone Air 改实体 SIM 卡
item.guid: 超雪团队成功实现-iPhone-Air-改实体-SIM-卡
item.description:
Yesterday, the Shenzhen Chaoxue team announced via Weibo that they have successfully enabled the iPhone Air to support reading physical SIM cards and released a live demonstration video. This model originally only supported eSIM, without a physical card slot. 昨天，深圳超雪团队通过微博宣布，已成功让 iPhone Air 支持读取实体 SIM 卡，并发布实机演示视频。该机型原本仅支持 eSIM，无实体卡槽。

The team explained that their technical principle is to simulate a regular SIM card as an eSIM with a pre-written number via software, making the phone recognize it as a legitimate eSIM. Combined with network access logic optimization, this allows locked phones to use regular SIM cards. 团队介绍，其技术原理是通过软件将普通 SIM 卡模拟为已写入号码的 eSIM，使手机识别为合法 eSIM，再结合入网逻辑优化，实现有锁机可用普通 SIM 卡。

The iPhone Air is the first mobile phone in mainland China to support eSIM, removing the traditional SIM card slot and retaining only eSIM functionality. iPhone Air 是中国大陆首款支持 eSIM 的手机，取消了传统 SIM 卡槽，仅保留 eSIM 功能。

The Chaoxue team emphasized that their research is not targeting eSIM vulnerabilities but rather using simulation to make the device mistakenly believe a regular SIM card is an eSIM. This not only allows locked phones to use physical cards but also retains eSIM download functionality, which is particularly useful for using local data cards when traveling abroad. 超雪团队强调，他们的研究并非针对 eSIM 漏洞，而是通过模拟方式让设备误认为普通 SIM 卡即为 eSIM。此举不仅让有锁机能够使用实体卡，还保留了 eSIM 下载功能，尤其适用于出境旅游时使用当地流量卡。

item.title: 雷军回应小米汽车获 2025 国际压铸大赛「最佳结构奖」
item.guid: 雷军回应小米汽车获-2025-国际压铸大赛「最佳结构奖」
item.description:
Yesterday, Xiaomi Auto announced on Weibo that its YU7 model's 20-in-1 integrated die-cast aluminum triangular beam won the "Best Structure Award" at the 2025 International Die Casting Competition held by the North American Die Casting Association, which is the highest honor of the event. 昨天，小米汽车在微博宣布，其 YU7 车型的 20 合 1 一体化压铸铝三角梁在北美压铸协会举办的 2025 International Die Casting Competition（2025 国际压铸大赛）中获「最佳结构奖」，该奖项为赛事最高级别荣誉。

The North American Die Casting Association (NADCA) is the largest and most professional die casting industry exhibition in North America. 北美压铸协会（NADCA）是北美地区规模最大、专业性最强的压铸行业展会。

Xiaomi stated that the integrated die-cast aluminum triangular beam plays a crucial role in overall vehicle safety. As one of the main force transmission paths during a collision, it can effectively disperse impact forces, enhance the vehicle body's energy absorption capacity, and thus reduce energy impact on the passenger compartment. 小米方面表示，该一体化压铸铝三角梁在整车安全层面发挥关键作用，作为碰撞主要传力路径之一，可在车辆发生碰撞时有效分散冲击力，提升车体吸能能力，从而降低对乘员舱的能量冲击。

Furthermore, this structure adopts a cross-system integrated design for the body and thermal management, supporting the attachment of components such as the air conditioning unit, compressor, refrigerant, and cooling modules. This makes the front compartment layout more compact and creates a 141 L extra-large front trunk for the YU7. Combined with the integrated die-cast rear floor, battery pack, and body-integrated design (CTB), the vehicle's torsional rigidity reaches 47610 N·m/deg, which is a leading level in its class. 此外，该结构采用车身与热管理跨系统集成化设计，承担空调箱、压缩机、冷媒与冷却模块等部件挂接功能，使前舱布局更为紧凑，并为 YU7 创造出 141 L 超大前备箱。结合一体化压铸后地板、电池包与车身一体化设计（CTB），该车型车身扭转刚度达到 47610 N·m/deg，处于同级领先水平。

Xiaomi Auto CEO Lei Jun stated on Weibo that the company will continue to increase R&D investment, committed to creating a safer and more reliable car experience for users. 小米汽车 CEO 雷军在微博表示，公司将持续加大研发投入，致力于为用户打造更安全、可靠的用车体验。

item.title: 中汽中心明确动力电池三大类：固态、固液混合、液态电池
item.guid: 中汽中心明确动力电池三大类：固态、固液混合、液态电池
item.description:
According to Kuaikeji, at the 'Global Power Battery Frontier Technology and Innovation Forum' of the 2025 World Power Battery Conference held yesterday in Yibin, Sichuan, Wang Fang, Chief Scientist of China Automotive Technology and Research Center, stated that national standards are being formulated to classify power batteries into three major categories based on electrolyte state: solid-state batteries, solid-liquid hybrid batteries, and liquid-state batteries. 据快科技报道，昨天在四川宜宾举行的 2025 世界动力电池大会「全球动力电池前瞻技术与创新论坛」上，中国汽车技术研究中心首席科学家王芳表示，正在制定国家标准，将动力电池按照电解质状态分为固态电池、固液混合电池和液态电池三大类。

Wang Fang pointed out that liquid-state battery technology is mature and low-cost, making it the mainstream choice for current electric vehicles, but its energy density has a limited upper bound, and there are risks of leakage and thermal runaway. Solid-liquid hybrid batteries offer a 30%-50% increase in energy density compared to liquid-state batteries and higher safety, thus being considered a transitional solution. All-solid-state batteries can achieve more than twice the energy density of liquid-state batteries and possess stronger thermal stability and safety, but mass production is still constrained by conductivity and cost issues. 王芳指出，液态电池技术成熟、成本低，是当前电动车的主流选择，但能量密度上限有限，且存在漏液与热失控风险。固液混合电池能量密度较液态提升 30%-50%，安全性更高，被视为过渡方案。全固态电池能量密度可达液态电池的 2 倍以上，具备更强的热稳定性和安全性，但量产仍受制于导电性与成本问题。

Furthermore, CATARC clarified terms and classifications related to solid-state batteries, emphasizing that the term 'semi-solid-state battery' can be misleading, and the more accurate term should be solid-liquid hybrid battery. 此外，中汽中心明确了固态电池相关术语与分类，强调「半固态电池」的表述容易造成误导，更准确的称呼应为固液混合电池。

Industry experts predict that all-solid-state batteries will achieve small-scale application by 2030 and are expected to be widely promoted by 2035. Some analyses suggest that solid-state batteries have significant advantages in safety, energy density, and lifespan, but their manufacturing costs are high, and industrialization still requires breakthroughs. 业内预计，全固态电池将在 2030 年实现小规模应用，2035 年有望大规模推广。部分分析认为，固态电池在安全性、能量密度和寿命方面优势明显，但制造成本偏高，产业化仍需突破。

item.title: 苹果官网上架索尼 PSVR2 手柄
item.guid: 苹果官网上架索尼-PSVR2-手柄
item.description:
Apple has officially started selling the Sony PlayStation VR2 Sense controller and charging set on its US official website, priced at $249.95 (approximately 1770 RMB). The set includes left and right controllers (with wrist straps), a charging dock, a power adapter, a power cable, and two USB adapters. 苹果已在美国官网正式开售索尼 PlayStation VR2 Sense 手柄及充电套装，售价为 249.95 美元（约合 1770 元人民币）。该套装包含左右手柄（附腕带）、充电底座、电源适配器、电源线及两枚 USB 转接器。

With the visionOS 26 update, the PSVR2 Sense controller now supports Vision Pro devices equipped with M2 and M5 chips, offering high-precision motion tracking, finger touch detection, and haptic feedback. 随着 visionOS 26 的更新，PSVR2 Sense 手柄现已支持搭载 M2 与 M5 芯片的 Vision Pro，提供高精度动作追踪、手指触控检测与震动反馈。

Apple stated that in addition to being available for purchase on its official website, the set will also be available for in-store pickup at select US Apple Store locations starting November 17. Currently, this product is only sold in the US market and has not yet expanded to other countries. 苹果表示，该套装除可在官网购买外，自 11 月 17 日起也将在部分美国 Apple Store 门店提供自提服务。 目前该产品仅在美国市场销售，尚未扩展至其他国家。

The addition of PSVR2 Sense brings richer game interaction methods to the Vision Pro platform, allowing users to turn off hand tracking and switch to physical buttons and joystick controls. PSVR2 Sense 的加入为 Vision Pro 平台带来更丰富的游戏交互方式，用户可关闭手部追踪，改用物理按键与摇杆操作。

item.title: 阿里巴巴启动消费端「千问」项目，全面对标 ChatGPT
item.guid: 阿里巴巴启动消费端「千问」项目，全面对标-ChatGPT
item.description:
According to Wall Street News, Alibaba has secretly launched the 'Qianwen' project, fully entering the consumer-facing AI application market, benchmarking against ChatGPT. 据《华尔街见闻》报道，阿里巴巴已秘密启动「千问」项目，全面进军 C 端 AI 应用市场，对标 ChatGPT。

The report states that Alibaba Group is preparing a major revamp of its flagship AI application 'Tongyi Qianwen,' renaming it 'Qianwen' App, positioning it as a personal AI assistant, and simultaneously developing an international version to directly compete for overseas users. 报道称，阿里巴巴集团正准备对其旗舰 AI 应用「通义千问」进行重大改版，更名为「千问」App，定位个人 AI 助手，并同步研发国际版，直接争夺海外用户。

The news indicates that Alibaba has seconded over a hundred engineers from its Hangzhou headquarters and set up two dedicated office floors to advance R&D. This move is seen as another key action following the announcement of 380 billion RMB in AI infrastructure investment earlier this year, marking a strategic shift from B-side to C-side for the company. 消息显示，阿里巴巴在杭州总部抽调逾百名工程师，专设两层办公楼推进研发。此次布局被视为继年初宣布 3800 亿元 AI 基础设施投资后的又一关键动作，标志着公司战略从 B 端转向 C 端。

The new 'Qianwen' app will introduce Agent-style AI features, deeply integrating with platforms like Taobao, aiming to create a one-stop intelligent assistant. 新版「千问」应用将引入 Agent 式 AI 功能，深度融合淘宝等平台，力图打造一站式智能助手。

Previously, Alibaba CEO Wu Yongming had clearly put forward an AI investment blueprint, emphasizing a 'full-stack' technology layout. The newly released Qwen3-Max model has over a trillion parameters, ranks among the top three globally in performance, and has surpassed 600 million downloads. 此前，阿里巴巴 CEO 吴泳铭已明确提出 AI 投资蓝图，强调「全栈」技术布局。最新发布的 Qwen3-Max 模型参数规模超过万亿，性能跻身全球前三，下载量突破 6 亿次。

Airbnb CEO Brian Chesky publicly stated that the company 'heavily relies on Qwen'; Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang also said that it has captured a significant portion of the global open-source model market. Airbnb CEO 布莱恩 · 切斯基公开表示公司「大量依赖 Qwen」；英伟达 CEO 黄仁勋也称其已占据全球开源模型大部分市场。

Following the announcement, Alibaba's Hong Kong shares surged over 5% during intraday trading yesterday, and the Hang Seng Tech Index also turned from losses to gains. 消息公布后，昨天阿里巴巴港股盘中一度拉升超 5%，恒生科技指数亦由跌转涨。

item.title: 腾讯公布 Q3 财报，聚焦 AI 投入引领增长
item.guid: 腾讯公布-Q3-财报，聚焦-AI-投入引领增长
item.description:
Yesterday, Tencent released its Q3 2025 financial report, with total revenue reaching 192.87 billion RMB, a 15% year-on-year increase. 昨日，腾讯公布了 2025 年第三季度财报， 总收入达 1928.7 亿元， 同比 增长 15%。

Among them, To B business (FinTech and Business Services) revenue reached 58.2 billion RMB, a 10% year-on-year increase, becoming the core growth driver. The financial report shows that strong enterprise demand for AI drove double-digit growth in segments such as Tencent Cloud services and WeChat Mini Store e-commerce technical services. 其中 To B 业务（金融科技及企业服务）营收 582 亿元，同比增长 10%，成为增长核心动力。财报显示，企业对 AI 的旺盛需求推动腾讯云服务、微信小店带货技术服务等板块保持双位数增长。

This quarter, Tencent continued to increase its strategic investment in AI, with R&D expenditure growing by 28% year-on-year to 22.8 billion RMB, setting a new quarterly record. The Hunyuan large model topped multiple authoritative rankings, and its open-source model downloads exceeded one million. 本季度， 腾讯持续加大 AI 战略投入，研发支出同比增长 28%，达 228 亿元，创单季新高。 混元大模型在多项权威榜单登顶，开源模型下载量破百万。

Furthermore, the financial report shows that Tencent achieved good results this quarter in terms of application-level development, industrial implementation, and international business. Currently, Tencent has established 11 regional offices and deployed 9 technical support centers globally. 此外，财报显示腾讯本季度在应用层面、产业落地、国际业务方面均取得较好成绩。目前，腾讯已在全球设立 11 个区域办公室，部署 9 个技术支持中心。

In addition, the financial report also mentioned that as of September 30, Tencent's employee count continued to increase, totaling 115,076 employees, a further increase from 111,200 employees in Q2. 此外，财报还提到，截至 9 月 30 日，腾讯的员工数量继续增加，共有 115076 名员工，在 Q2 11.12 万名员工的基础上进一步增长。

Regarding compensation, in the third quarter of 2025, Tencent Group's total remuneration cost for three months reached RMB 32.4 billion. Compared to RMB 29.6 billion in the same period last year, the increase was 9.5%. 薪酬方面，2025年第三季度， 腾讯集团三个月的总酬金成本高达人民币 324 亿元。 与同比去年同期的 296 亿元相比，涨幅 9.5%。

During the Q3 earnings call held last night, the company stated that actual capital expenditures for the full year 2025 are expected to be lower than previous guidance but still higher than 2024 levels. 在昨天晚间举行的三季度财报电话会上，公司表示 2025 年全年实际资本支出预计将低于此前指引，但仍高于 2024 年水平。

Tencent executives emphasized that current GPU reserves are sufficient to meet internal usage demands, and the shortage of AI chip supply is the main factor limiting the growth of cloud business revenue. 腾讯高层强调， 当前 GPU 储备充足，足以满足内部使用需求，AI 芯片供应短缺是限制云业务收入增长的主要因素。

Tencent CEO Pony Ma pointed out at the meeting that the company is upgrading the Hunyuan large model architecture, and WeChat will gradually introduce AI functions in the future. The ultimate goal is to launch an 'AI intelligent agent' to help users complete tasks across the five major ecosystems of communication, social interaction, content, mini-programs, payment, and business, becoming an ideal personal assistant. 腾讯 CEO 马化腾在会上指出，公司正在升级混元大模型架构，未来微信将逐步引入 AI 功能，最终目标是推出一个「AI 智能体」，在通信、社交、内容、小程序、支付与商业五大生态中帮助用户完成任务，成为理想的个人助手。

Tencent President Martin Lau added that the WeChat ecosystem has closed-loop execution capabilities, and combined with the functions of the Yuanbao application, it can enhance user experience in scenarios such as content summarization, search optimization, and e-commerce transactions. 腾讯总裁刘炽平补充称，微信生态具备闭环执行能力，结合元宝应用的功能，能够在内容总结、搜索优化和电商交易等场景中提升用户体验。

item.title: 京东公布 Q3 财报：供应链与 AI 投入加码，线下门店突破 4000 家
item.guid: 京东公布-Q3-财报：供应链与-AI-投入加码，线下门店突破-4000-家
item.description:
Yesterday, JD.com Group released its third-quarter financial report, showing revenue of RMB 299.1 billion, a year-on-year increase of 14.9%. Net profit attributable to ordinary shareholders of the company was RMB 5.3 billion, a significant decrease from RMB 11.7 billion in the same period last year. 昨天，京东集团公布第三季度财报，显示营收达 2,991 亿元，同比增长 14.9%。归属于公司普通股股东的净利润为 53 亿元，较去年同期的 117 亿元明显下降。

Meanwhile, JD.com posted on its official WeChat public account 'JD Blackboard News,' stating that the company maintained growth momentum in both core and emerging businesses. Supermarket category revenue has achieved double-digit growth for 7 consecutive quarters, and apparel and footwear revenue grew approximately 8 times faster than the industry average year-on-year. 与此同时，京东在官方微信公众号「京东黑板报」发文指出，公司在核心业务和新兴业务上均保持增长势头。商超品类收入已连续 7 个季度实现双位数增长，服装鞋帽收入同比增速约为行业的 8 倍。

New business revenues, such as food delivery, increased by 214% year-on-year, further accelerating from Q2. Service revenue increased by 30.8% year-on-year, with its proportion rising to 24.4%, a new high in nearly two years. 外卖等新业务收入同比增长 214%，环比二季度进一步加速。服务收入同比增长 30.8%，占比提升至 24.4%，创近两年新高。

Regarding supply chain and offline presence, as of the end of Q3, JD.com's 3C digital stores exceeded 4,000, national JD MALL stores surpassed 20, and JD Home Appliances City Flagship Stores exceeded 100. 供应链和线下布局方面，截至三季度末，京东 3C 数码门店突破 4,000 家，全国京东 MALL 门店超过 20 家，京东电器城市旗舰店超过 100 家。

In the future, JD Logistics plans to purchase 3 million robots, 1 million unmanned vehicles, and 100,000 drones within five years to strengthen its super supply chain infrastructure. 未来，京东物流计划五年内采购 300 万台机器人、100 万台无人车和 10 万架无人机，以强化超级供应链基础设施。

In terms of technology investment, JD.com's cumulative R&D investment has reached nearly RMB 160 billion, and it has released 'AI Hospital 1.0' and the industry's first industrial supply chain large model, promoting the digital upgrade of medical and industrial scenarios. 在技术投入方面，京东累计研发投入已近 1,600 亿元，并发布「AI 医院 1.0」与行业首个工业供应链大模型，推动医疗与工业场景的数字化升级。

Additionally, JD.com's 11.11 transaction volume reached a new high, with the number of ordering users increasing by 40% and order volume growing by nearly 60%. 此外，京东 11.11 成交额再创新高，下单用户数增长 40%，订单量增长近 60%。

item.title: AI 生成歌曲登顶 Billboard 榜单引争议
item.guid: AI-生成歌曲登顶-Billboard-榜单引争议
item.description:
According to Futurism, a recently AI-generated country song titled 'Walk My Walk' topped the US Billboard 'Country Digital Song Sales' chart. 据 Futurism 报道，近日，一首由 AI 生成、名为「Walk My Walk」的乡村歌曲登上了美国 Billboard「Country Digital Song Sales」榜首。

The song, released by the virtual band Breaking Rust, tells the story of a man who is 'knocked down, jeans covered in mud, but still keeps going,' and is accompanied by an AI video, which has been widely circulated on the internet. 该曲由虚拟乐团 Breaking Rust 发布，歌词讲述一名男子「被打倒、牛仔裤沾满泥，但仍坚持走下去」的故事，并配有 AI 视频，在互联网上广泛传播。

The report states that Breaking Rust has over 2 million monthly listeners on Spotify and is labeled as a 'verified artist,' but has no biography. Several of its works have surpassed a million plays, with one single released last month accumulating over 4.5 million plays. 报道称，Breaking Rust 在 Spotify 上已拥有超过 200 万月度听众，且被标注为「认证艺人」，但并无任何简介。其多首作品播放量突破百万，其中一首上月发布的单曲累计播放量超过 450 万次。

Spotify shows Aubierre Rivaldo Taylor as the 'lyricist' and 'composer' for the group. At the same time, he also creates a large amount of 'vulgar' AI music under the name 'Defbeatsai'. Spotify 显示 Aubierre Rivaldo Taylor 为该团体的「作词」与「作曲」。同时，他还以「Defbeatsai」名义创作大量「低俗」AI 音乐。

Billboard disclosed earlier this month that for the past four consecutive weeks, at least one artist using AI or AI-assisted creation has entered the charts. Billboard 本月早些时候披露，过去连续四周至少有一位使用 AI 或 AI 辅助创作的艺术家进入榜单。

Meanwhile, the music industry has signed multi-million dollar contracts with AI artists. Universal Music even announced a licensing partnership with AI music generation app Udio for an upcoming AI creation platform. 与此同时，音乐产业已与 AI 艺人签订数百万美元合约。环球音乐甚至宣布与 AI 音乐生成应用 Udio 达成授权合作，用于即将推出的 AI 创作平台。

Spotify recently introduced new policies aimed at preventing 'spam, impersonation, and deception,' but has not banned AI music. Spotify 近期出台新政策，旨在防范「垃圾、冒充和欺骗」，但并未禁止 AI 音乐。

Previously, the virtual band The Velvet Sundown also attracted attention after being revealed as a 'synthetic music project'. 此前，虚拟乐团 The Velvet Sundown 也因被揭露为「合成音乐项目」而引发关注。

Experts point out that this trend may further exacerbate the difficulty for real musicians to break through and make a living. 专家指出，这一趋势可能进一步加剧真实音乐人突破与谋生的难度。

Jason Palamara, Assistant Professor of Music Technology at Indiana University, stated: 'AI bands will make it harder for real musicians to gain attention on streaming platforms like Apple Music and Spotify.' 印第安纳大学音乐技术助理教授 Jason Palamara 表示：「AI 乐团将使真实音乐人更难在 Apple Music、Spotify 等流媒体平台获得关注。」

item.title: 腾讯元器与小米合作，智能体一键上架应用商店
item.guid: 腾讯元器与小米合作，智能体一键上架应用商店
item.description:
Yesterday, Xiaomi and Tencent officially reached a cooperation, with both parties announcing the integration of Tencent Cloud's 'Yuanqi' platform with the Xiaomi App Store for intelligent agent distribution. 昨天，小米与腾讯正式达成合作，双方宣布腾讯云旗下的「元器」平台与小米应用商店实现智能体分发打通。

According to reports, after developers complete the creation and debugging of AI intelligent agents on Tencent Yuanqi, they can list them on the Xiaomi App Store with one click, without additional development. The Xiaomi App Store homepage has also simultaneously launched an 'AI Intelligent Agent Zone,' where users can directly search or browse and use intelligent agents just like downloading apps. 据介绍，开发者在腾讯元器完成 AI 智能体的创建与调试后，可一键上架至小米应用商店，无需额外开发。小米应用商店首页也同步上线「AI 智能体专区」，用户可像下载 App 一样直接搜索或浏览智能体并使用。

Tencent Yuanqi debuted in May last year, positioned as a one-stop AI intelligent agent creation and distribution platform, emphasizing 'low threshold and easy operation.' The platform simplifies the development process through modular methods, allowing developers to quickly build intelligent agents without programming and deeply connect with the WeChat ecosystem. 腾讯元器于去年 5 月亮相，定位为一站式 AI 智能体创作与分发平台，主打「低门槛、好操作」。平台通过模块化方式简化开发流程，开发者无需编程即可快速搭建智能体，并能与微信生态深度连接。

This cooperation brings two major advantages for developers: first, expanded reach, as intelligent agents can directly reach hundreds of millions of Xiaomi App Store users; second, shortened feedback cycles, allowing developers to quickly optimize product experience with the help of app store traffic. 此次合作为开发者带来两大优势：一是覆盖面扩大，智能体可直接触达数亿小米应用商店用户；二是反馈周期缩短，开发者可借助应用商店流量快速优化产品体验。

In addition, both parties have jointly launched an intelligent agent collection event . Submissions must be listed between November 12th and November 30th, and the list of winners will be announced on December 9th. Excellent works will not only have the chance to win JD.com gift cards but also receive recommendations in the Xiaomi App Store's special zone and channel Token subsidies. 此外，双方还联合发起 智能体征集活动 ，参赛作品需在 11 月 12 日至 11 月 30 日期间完成上架，获奖名单将于 12 月 9 日公布。优秀作品不仅有机会获得京东卡奖励，还将获得小米应用商店专区推荐及渠道 Token 补贴。

item.title: 滴滴自动驾驶出海，首站落地阿布扎比拓展中东市场
item.guid: 滴滴自动驾驶出海，首站落地阿布扎比拓展中东市场
item.description:
Yesterday, Didi announced a strategic cooperation with the Abu Dhabi Investment Office (ADIO), officially joining SAVI, Abu Dhabi's smart and autonomous vehicle industry cluster. This marks Didi Autonomous Driving's first entry into the Middle East. 昨天，滴滴宣布与阿布扎比投资办公室（ADIO）达成战略合作，正式加入阿布扎比智能和自动驾驶汽车产业集群 SAVI。这是滴滴自动驾驶首次在中东落地。

Both parties will collaborate in areas such as autonomous driving technology application, AI talent cultivation, and ecosystem building, supporting Abu Dhabi in creating a smart mobility and sustainable transportation ecosystem. 双方将在自动驾驶技术应用、AI 人才培养及生态建设等领域展开合作，支持阿布扎比打造智慧出行和可持续交通生态。

The SAVI industry cluster, led by the Abu Dhabi Department of Economic Development and ADIO, is a smart transportation hub in the Middle East and North Africa, aiming to advance innovation and commercialization of autonomous driving technologies across sea, land, and air. SAVI 产业集群由阿布扎比经济发展部和 ADIO 主导，是中东和北非地区智能交通枢纽，目标推进海、陆、空自动驾驶技术创新与商业化。

ADIO expects the cluster to contribute 44 billion dirhams to GDP and create 40,000 jobs by 2045. ADIO 预计，到 2045 年该集群将贡献 440 亿迪拉姆 GDP，并创造 4 万个就业岗位。

item.title: 徕芬入局洗地机赛道，负责人来自大疆
item.guid: 徕芬入局洗地机赛道，负责人来自大疆
item.description:
According to 36Kr, Laifen has confirmed its entry into the floor washer market, with the project leader coming from DJI. This business has been secretly advancing within Laifen for at least six months, and the company has not yet publicly responded. 据 36 氪报道，徕芬已确认进入洗地机赛道，项目负责人来自大疆。该业务已在徕芬内部秘密推进至少半年，目前公司尚未对外公开回应。

DJI officially entered the home cleaning market this year, launching the ROMO robot vacuum cleaner with a starting price of 4699 yuan. However, reports indicate that Laifen's floor washer head is not from the ROMO team. 大疆今年正式进入家庭清洁赛道，推出扫地机器人 ROMO，起售价 4699 元。然而，报道指出，徕芬洗地机负责人并非来自 ROMO 团队。

According to Aoweiyun.com data, in 2024, the penetration rate of floor washers in China is about 3.1%, with the number of models reaching 1042, doubling compared to 2022. The market is highly concentrated, with Tineco, under Ecovacs, occupying over 30% market share, followed closely by Dreame and Roborock. 根据奥维云网数据，2024 年我国洗地机渗透率约 3.1%，型号数量达到 1042 个，相比 2022 年翻倍。市场高度集中，科沃斯旗下添可占据超 30% 市场份额，追觅与石头紧随其后。

Despite fierce competition, the floor washer market is still rapidly expanding. Retail sales were less than 100 million yuan in 2019, reaching 14.09 billion yuan by 2024. Ecovacs' Q3 financial report shows that its operating revenue increased by 29.3% year-on-year, with floor washers becoming a significant growth engine. 尽管竞争激烈，洗地机市场仍在快速扩张。2019 年零售额不足 1 亿元，至 2024 年已达 140.9 亿元。科沃斯三季度财报显示，其营业收入同比增长 29.3%，洗地机成为重要增长引擎。

Laifen was founded in 2019 and experienced explosive growth in the high-speed hairdryer market, with GMV (Gross Merchandise Volume) reaching 3 billion yuan in 2023. However, with intensifying competition, its 618 GMV in 2025 has shrunk by nearly 40%. 徕芬成立于 2019 年，曾在高速吹风机市场实现爆发式增长，2023 年 GMV（商品交易总额）达到 30 亿元。但随着竞争加剧，2025 年 618 GMV 已缩水近四成。

item.title: V 社推出新头显，支持运行 Android 应用
item.guid: V-社推出新头显，支持运行-Android-应用
item.description:
According to The Verge, Valve officially announced yesterday the launch of its wireless VR headset 'Steam Frame,' dubbed 'a Steam Deck for your face'. 据 The Verge 报道，Valve 昨天正式宣布推出无线 VR 头显「Steam Frame」，被称为「戴在脸上的 Steam Deck」。

The device is powered by an Arm-based Qualcomm Snapdragon chip, supporting not only Windows games but also allowing developers to bring Android apps to the Steam platform for the first time. 该设备搭载 Arm 架构的高通骁龙芯片，不仅支持 Windows 游戏，还 首次允许开发者将 Android 应用引入 Steam 平台。

Valve engineers stated that users will be able to directly download and run Android APKs on Steam in the future without additional conversion, which is especially suitable for VR game developers. The company also launched the Steam Frame developer kit, aiming to attract developers from VR platforms like Meta Quest to quickly adapt. Valve 工程师表示，用户未来可以直接在 Steam 下载并运行 Android APK，无需额外转换，尤其适用于 VR 游戏开发者。公司同时推出 Steam Frame 开发者套件，旨在吸引 Meta Quest 等 VR 平台的开发者快速适配。

At a functional level, Valve plans to provide Steam Frame with rich browser integration and multitasking support, allowing users to access web applications using floating windows on the device. 在功能层面，Valve 计划为 Steam Frame 提供丰富的浏览器集成和多任务支持，用户可在设备上使用浮动窗口访问网页应用。

Although Valve emphasizes that its core positioning remains gaming, it also acknowledges precedents for tool software on Steam, such as Blender. Valve executives also revealed that SteamOS may expand to more Arm devices in the future, including laptops and handhelds. 尽管 Valve 强调其核心定位仍是游戏，但也承认工具类软件在 Steam 上已有先例，例如 Blender。Valve 高管还透露， SteamOS 未来或将扩展至更多 Arm 设备，包括笔记本和掌机。

item.title: Epic 发布虚幻引擎 5.7，推出 AI 助手与新材质系统
item.guid: Epic-发布虚幻引擎-5.7，推出-AI-助手与新材质系统
item.description:
Epic Games officially released Unreal Engine 5.7 yesterday. The new version introduces several core features such as Nanite Foliage, MegaLights, AI Assistant, and the Substrate material system, comprehensively enhancing lighting and shadow rendering, vegetation performance, and development efficiency. Epic Games 昨天正式发布 Unreal Engine 5.7，新版本引入 Nanite Foliage、MegaLights、AI 助手以及 Substrate 材质系统等多项核心功能，全面提升光影渲染、植被表现与开发效率。

    MegaLights Lighting System: Enters Beta phase, supporting large-scale dynamic light source shadow casting, significantly reducing manual optimization requirements, and enhancing the realism of lighting and shadows in large open-world scenes;

    Nanite Foliage Technology: For the first time, Nanite geometric rendering is applied to vegetation, enabling automatic drawing of millions of detailed elements, supporting dynamic physical effects such as wind, and avoiding the "popping" texture issues caused by traditional LOD switching;

    Substrate Material System: Upgraded to a production-ready version, supporting high-fidelity rendering of multi-layered materials, capable of simulating complex surfaces such as rusted metal, wet stone, and fabric reflections;

    AI Assistant Integration: Directly embedded into the editor, developers can access C++ code examples and tutorials via the sidebar, shortening the learning curve and improving team collaboration efficiency;

    Performance Optimization: Includes improvements to the Metahuman system, animation toolchain, and lighting engine, reducing GPU burden and enhancing overall performance.

Epic states that the Unreal Engine 5.7 update allows developers to achieve cinematic visual experiences on next-gen consoles, PCs, and mobile platforms, while balancing performance and productivity. This version is considered a crucial pillar for "AAA" game development. Epic 表示，Unreal Engine 5.7 的更新让开发者能够在次世代主机、PC 与移动平台上实现电影级视觉体验，同时兼顾效能与生产效率。该版本被视为「三 A」游戏开发的重要支柱。

item.title: 前三季度利润暴跌 99%，保时捷中国总裁首度回应在华发展问题
item.guid: 前三季度利润暴跌-99%，保时捷中国总裁首度回应在华发展问题
item.description:
According to Blue Whale News, Alexander Pollich, CEO of Porsche China, stated in an interview that the Chinese market is undergoing profound changes in the definition and consumption trends of luxury cars. 据蓝鲸新闻报道，保时捷中国 CEO 潘励驰（Alexander Pollich）在接受采访时表示，中国市场正在经历豪华车定义与消费趋势的深刻变化。

With the high demand for intelligence from young consumers, Porsche has established its first overseas integrated R&D center in Shanghai, focusing on areas such as infotainment systems, advanced driver-assistance systems, and battery management, to cope with the increasingly competitive market environment. 随着年轻消费者对智能化的高度需求，保时捷已在上海设立首个海外综合研发中心，聚焦信息娱乐系统、高级驾驶辅助系统及电池管理等领域，以应对竞争加剧的市场环境。

Pollich emphasized that Chinese consumers' expectations for "intelligence" have surpassed those in the European market, and intelligent features are becoming standard for luxury cars. Porsche will further strengthen its competitiveness in China through localized R&D and exclusive model layouts. 潘励驰强调，中国消费者对「智能化」的期待已超越欧洲市场，智能化功能正成为豪华车的标配。保时捷将通过本土化研发与专属车型布局，进一步强化在华竞争力。

Oliver Blume, Head of Global R&D at Porsche, pointed out that the luxury electric vehicle market has not yet fully formed but is expected to mature gradually in the future. The company will adhere to a "three-pronged" strategy, simultaneously advancing iterations of internal combustion engine, plug-in hybrid, and pure electric models. 保时捷全球研发负责人施德纳指出，豪华电动车市场尚未完全形成，但预计未来将逐步成熟。公司将坚持「三管齐下」策略，同时推进内燃机、插电式混合动力与纯电车型迭代。

In terms of product strategy, Porsche plans to launch the all-electric 718 two-door sports car in 2027 and continue to upgrade electric models such as Taycan, Macan, and Cayenne to enrich its electrified lineup. 产品战略方面，保时捷计划在 2027 年推出纯电 718 双门跑车，并继续升级 Taycan、Macan 与 Cayenne 等电动车型，以丰富电气化阵容。

Financial data shows that Porsche's revenue in the first three quarters of 2025 decreased by 6% year-on-year to 26.86 billion euros, and operating profit plummeted by 99% year-on-year to 40 million euros, with sales in the Chinese market reaching approximately 32,000 units. 财务数据显示，保时捷 2025 年前三季度营收同比下降 6% 至 268.6 亿欧元，营业利润同比大幅下滑 99% 至 4000 万欧元，中国市场销量约 3.2 万辆。

Amid performance pressure, Porsche announced that Michael Leiters will take over as CEO starting January 1, 2026, while current CEO Oliver Blume will continue to serve as CEO of the Volkswagen Group. 在业绩承压背景下，保时捷宣布自 2026 年 1 月 1 日起由 Michael Leiters 接任 CEO，而现任 CEO 奥博穆将继续担任大众汽车集团 CEO。

item.title: 💡 李彦宏：AI 产业结构正转变为「倒金字塔」
item.guid: 💡-李彦宏：AI-产业结构正转变为「倒金字塔」
item.description:
At the 2025 Baidu World Conference held yesterday in Beijing, Baidu founder and CEO Robin Li delivered a keynote speech titled "Effect Emergence." He emphasized that when AI capabilities are internalized as the native abilities of enterprises and individuals, intelligence is no longer a cost but a productivity. 昨天在北京举行的 2025 年百度世界大会上，百度创始人兼 CEO 李彦宏发表题为「效果涌现」的主旨演讲。他强调，当 AI 能力被内化为企业与个人的原生能力时，智能不再是成本，而是生产力。

He pointed out that the AI industry structure is undergoing a significant transformation, gradually shifting from an unhealthy "upright pyramid" in the past to a more sustainable "inverted pyramid" model. 他指出，AI 产业结构正在经历重要转型，从过去不健康的「正金字塔」逐步转向更具可持续性的「倒金字塔」模式。

Robin Li explained that in the traditional "upright pyramid" structure, chip manufacturers capture most of the value, while models and applications above them experience diminishing returns. This pattern has led to market skepticism about the long-term development of AI. 李彦宏解释称，传统的「正金字塔」结构中，芯片厂商占据了绝大部分价值，而位于其上的模型和应用则收益递减。这种格局导致市场对 AI 的长期发展产生怀疑。

He emphasized that a healthy "inverted pyramid" structure should be: regardless of how much chip manufacturers profit, models need to create 10 times the value, and applications developed based on models should achieve 100 times the value. This logic not only enhances the sustainability of the industrial ecosystem but also helps promote innovation and application implementation. 他强调，健康的「倒金字塔」结构应当是： 芯片厂商无论盈利多少，模型需创造 10 倍的价值，而基于模型开发的应用则应实现 100 倍的价值。 这一逻辑不仅能提升产业生态的可持续性，也有助于推动创新与应用落地。

He also stated that application-layer innovation is pushing the industry across a critical point, moving from "intelligence emergence" to "effect emergence," and intelligence will become a growth engine for enterprises and individuals. 他还表示，应用层创新正在推动行业跨越临界点，从「智能涌现」走向「效果涌现」，智能将成为企业和个人的增长引擎。

Regarding enterprise application directions, Robin Li proposed three representative scenarios: first, AI replacing repetitive labor, such as auxiliary programming tools; second, infinite supply of productivity, as AIGC technology develops, content supply will approach infinity; third, AI surpassing human cognition, discovering global optimal solutions through model iteration. 在企业应用方向上，李彦宏提出三大代表性场景：一是 AI 替代重复性劳动，如辅助编程工具；二是生产力的无限供给，随着 AIGC 技术发展，内容供给将趋近无限；三是 AI 超越人类认知，通过模型迭代发现全局最优解。

He particularly emphasized "digital humans" as a new universal interactive interface in the AI era, which can be widely applied in e-commerce, education, healthcare, information, customer service, and other scenarios, making human-computer interaction more natural. 他特别强调「数字人」作为 AI 时代的全新通用交互界面，能够在电商、教育、医疗、资讯、客服等场景中广泛应用，使人机交互更自然。

Meanwhile, Baidu Search's AI transformation has become the most aggressive case globally, with search result pages reconstructed by AI, and the rich media coverage of the first result reaching 70%. 与此同时，百度搜索的 AI 化改造已成为全球最激进的案例，搜索结果页由 AI 重构，首条结果的富媒体化覆盖率已达 70%。

In the field of autonomous driving, Robin Li cited ARK Invest data predicting that by 2030, the cost of Robotaxi per mile in the US will drop to about $0.25, and demand is expected to increase 5 to 7 times. He believes that autonomous vehicles will become a new mobile living space, bringing profound changes to the social ecosystem. 在无人驾驶领域，李彦宏引用 ARK 投资机构数据预测，到 2030 年，美国 Robotaxi 每英里成本将降至约 0.25 美元，需求有望放大 5 至 7 倍。他认为，无人车将成为全新的移动生活空间，带来社会生态的深刻改变。

In addition, Baidu also released the intelligent agent "Fa Mou" (伐谋), which can find global optimal solutions through self-evolution and is applied in fields such as transportation, energy, finance, logistics, and new drug research and development. 此外，百度还发布了智能体「伐谋」，可通过自我演化寻找全局最优解，应用于交通、能源、金融、物流及新药研发等领域。

Robin Li called on enterprises and individuals to change their working methods, transforming problems into AI-solvable problems, to promote the conversion of "intelligence dividends" into "social dividends." 李彦宏呼吁企业和个人改变工作方式，将问题转化为 AI 能解决的问题，以推动「智能红利」转化为「社会红利」。

item.title: 2998 元起，大疆发布 Osmo Action 6 可变光圈运动相机
item.guid: 2998-元起，大疆发布-Osmo-Action-6-可变光圈运动相机
item.description:
Yesterday, DJI officially launched its new flagship action camera, Osmo Action 6, featuring a new sensor and a new variable aperture function. The specific specifications are as follows: 昨天，大疆正式推出全新旗舰级运动相机 Osmo Action 6，搭载全新传感器并新增可变光圈功能，具体规格如下：

    Equipped with a new 1/1.1-inch square CMOS sensor;

    Supports variable aperture, ranging from f/2.0 to f/4.0;

    Supports up to 4K/120fps (4:3) recording, and adds a new "4K Free Cropping" mode, allowing users to shoot square footage first and then crop;

    Horizon Steady stabilization function upgraded to up to 4K/60fps;

    Battery life up to 240 minutes;

    Features 20-meter naked-camera waterproofing, and with a waterproof case, can achieve 60-meter deep diving photography, and can operate stably in environments from -20℃ to 45℃;

    Built-in color temperature sensor and barometer to optimize underwater image performance;

    DJI OsmoAudio™ dual microphone direct connection, enabling high-quality audio recording without a receiver;

DJI also launched a 2-year DJI Care Refresh service, which includes global travel insurance benefits. 售价方面，Osmo Action 6 标准套装起售价 2998 元，另提供畅拍套装、骑行套装、Vlog 套装等，价格区间在 ¥3296 至 ¥3796。官方还推出 2 年版 DJI Care 随心换服务，附赠全球旅游险权益。

item.title: 2199 元起，Rokid × 暴龙发布 BOLON AI 智能眼镜
item.guid: 2199-元起，Rokid-×-暴龙发布-BOLON-AI-智能眼镜
item.description:
Last night, Rokid and Bolon officially launched their co-developed new product, "BOLON AI Smart Glasses," available in three versions: sunglasses, optical glasses, and photochromic lenses, with two color options: obsidian black and geek gray. 昨晚，Rokid 乐奇与暴龙正式推出联合新品「BOLON AI 智能眼镜」，提供太阳镜、光学镜及全视线变色款三种版本，并有曜石黑与极客灰两种配色。

    Equipped with Qualcomm AR1 and NXP RT600 chips;

    Features a 12-megapixel Sony IMX681 camera, supporting HDR, LLHDR, and night scene optimization;

    Built-in 210mAh battery, offering over 24 hours of standby, 5 hours of talk time, 6 hours of music playback, 45 minutes of video recording, and 2 hours of AI feature usage;

    Equipped with a four-array microphone, supporting intelligent noise reduction and multi-mode pickup;

    Body weight approximately 38.5g;

    Features a titanium alloy hinge and elastic temples, claimed to be "undistorted after 20,000 folds".

Regarding other features, BOLON AI smart glasses already support QQ Music song requests and Flight Manager, and will expand to scenarios such as house viewing, car control, and novel reading in the future. 其他功能方面，BOLON AI 智能眼镜已支持 QQ 音乐点歌与航班管家，未来将扩展至看房、车控、小说阅读等场景。

In terms of pricing, BOLON AI smart glasses with plano sunglasses and anti-blue light lenses start at 2199 yuan. Custom prescription lenses are also available, with a maximum refractive index of 1.74, priced at 3349 yuan. The Transitions photochromic version is priced at 2599 yuan. 售价方面，BOLON AI 智能眼镜平光太阳镜、防蓝光镜片版售价 2199 元起，另有定制度数镜片，最高可选 1.74 折射率，售价 3349 元，全视线变色款售价 2599 元。

Meanwhile, Rokid, in collaboration with Ant Insurance and ZhongAn Online P&C Insurance, launched the world's first AR glasses screen damage insurance service, "Rokid Care," offering protection against screen damage and water ingress, priced at 199 yuan/year or 299 yuan/two years. 同时，Rokid 联合蚂蚁保与众安保险推出全球首个 AR 眼镜碎屏险服务「Rokid Care」，提供碎屏与进水保障，价格为 199 元/年或 299 元/两年。

item.title: 宇树发布首款轮式人形机器人 G1-D
item.guid: 宇树发布首款轮式人形机器人-G1-D
item.description:
Yesterday, Unitree Robotics launched its first wheeled humanoid robot, G1-D, on its official website, simultaneously introducing a full-stack solution for humanoid robot data collection and training. 昨天，宇树科技在官网上线首款轮式人形机器人 G1-D，并同步推出人形机器人数采训练全栈解决方案。

It is reported that this solution integrates the robot body, systematic data collection tools, and a model training and inference platform, aiming to promote the application of AI technology in industrial, commercial, and home scenarios. 据悉，该方案集机器人本体、系统化数据采集工具与模型训练推理平台于一体，旨在推动 AI 技术在工业、商业及家庭场景的落地应用。

The G1-D robot has a height range of approximately 1260 – 1680mm, with a high-definition binocular camera in its head and a high-definition camera in its hand. The product is divided into a standard version and a flagship version. The flagship version can be optionally equipped with a mobile chassis, reaching speeds of up to 1.5m/s and supporting 360° rotation in place. The standard version has a battery life of approximately 2 hours, while the flagship version has a battery life of approximately 6 hours. G1-D 机器人身高范围约 1260 – 1680mm，头部配备高清双目相机，手部配备高清相机。产品分为通用版与旗舰版，旗舰版可选配移动底盘，速度最高可达 1.5m/s，支持原地 360° 旋转。通用版续航约 2 小时，旗舰版续航约 6 小时。

In terms of structural design, the G1-D adopts a wheeled and lift-integrated mobile lifting solution, with a vertical working space of 0 – 2m and waist joint movement space of Z ± 155°, Y -2.5° ~ +135°. The total degrees of freedom are 17 (standard version) and 19 (flagship version), with a single arm having 7 degrees of freedom. This configuration supports higher precision operations and control responses. 在结构设计上，G1-D 采用轮式与升降结合的移动升降方案，垂直作业空间为 0 – 2m，腰关节运动空间为 Z ± 155°、Y -2.5° ~ +135°。整机自由度分别为 17（通用版）与 19（旗舰版），单臂自由度为 7，自由度配置支持更高精度的操作与控制响应。

Additionally, the G1-D can be optionally equipped with a two-finger gripper, a three-finger dexterous hand, or a five-finger dexterous hand, and is powered by an NVIDIA Jetson Orin NX 16GB module, with computing power up to 100 TOPS. This solution supports synchronous data collection by multiple robots, 7x24 hour reliable operation, and is compatible with mainstream open-source model frameworks. Developers can quickly initiate model development and simulation evaluation through "one-click training." 此外，G1-D 可选配二指夹爪、三指灵巧手或五指灵巧手，并搭载英伟达 Jetson Orin NX 16GB 模组，算力最高可达 100 TOPS。该方案支持多机器人同步采集、7 × 24 小时可靠运行，并兼容主流开源模型框架，开发者可通过「一键训练」快速启动模型开发与仿真评估。

Unitree Robotics stated that the G1-D will be applied in scenarios such as front desk reception, shelf organization, household chores, and inspection. 宇树科技表示，G1-D 将应用于前台接待、货架整理、家务处理及巡检等场景。

item.title: 初创公司 Even Realities 推出 G2 智能眼镜，搭配戒指实现手势交互
item.guid: 初创公司-Even-Realities-推出-G2-智能眼镜，搭配戒指实现手势交互
item.description:
According to WIRED, smart glasses startup Even Realities officially launched its new generation product, Even G2 smart glasses, and the accompanying R1 smart ring yesterday. 据 WIRED 报道，智能眼镜初创公司 Even Realities 昨天正式发布新一代产品 Even G2 智能眼镜及配套的 R1 智能戒指。

Company CEO Will Wang emphasized at the press conference that the G2 significantly improves upon the previous generation G1 in terms of display effect, weight, and wearing comfort. Specific specifications are as follows: 公司 CEO Will Wang 在发布会上强调，G2 在显示效果、重量和佩戴舒适度方面均较上一代 G1 有显著提升。具体规格如下：

    Equipped with a monochrome micro-LED projection display, 75% larger than the previous generation, utilizing the "Even HAO 2.0" optical system and high-definition lenses;

    Built-in "Even AI" assistant, with a new "Conversate" function that can generate subtitles during conversations, summarize meetings, or provide instant question suggestions;

    Paired with the R1 smart ring, it enables gesture control of the glasses interface and features heart rate, sleep, and blood oxygen monitoring functions, with data directly displayed in the glasses;

    The single frame weighs 36 grams and has an IP67 dustproof and waterproof rating.

Even Realities stated that the G1 is currently being sold in 350 luxury eyewear stores worldwide. The company plans to attract developers to expand its functions through the upcoming "Even Hub" platform, aiming to become "the Tesla and OpenAI of the smart eyewear field." Even Realities 表示，目前 G1 已进入全球 350 家奢侈眼镜店销售。公司计划通过即将上线的「Even Hub」平台吸引开发者扩展功能，目标是成为「智能眼镜领域的特斯拉与 OpenAI」。

Regarding pricing, the Even G2 is priced at $599 (approximately 4250 RMB), and the R1 is priced at $249 (approximately 1800 RMB). Both products went on sale simultaneously yesterday. Additionally, Even Realities has launched a promotional event where purchasing a G2 entitles you to a 50% discount on the R1 and its accessories. 售价方面，Even G2 定价 599 美元（约合 4250 元人民币），R1 定价 249 美元（约 1800 元人民币），两款产品已于昨天同步开售。此外，Even Realities 还推出促销活动，购买 G2 可享 R1 及配件半价优惠。

item.title: 百度发布全球首个原生全模态大模型文心 5.0
item.guid: 百度发布全球首个原生全模态大模型文心-5.0
item.description:
Yesterday, at the 2025 Baidu World Conference, Baidu officially released its native full-modal large model, "Wenxin 5.0". 昨天，在 2025 百度世界大会上，百度正式发布原生全模态大模型「文心 5.0」。

The model boasts 2.4 trillion parameters and employs a unified autoregressive architecture for native full-modal modeling, supporting multi-modal input and output including text, images, audio, and video. 该模型参数量达 2.4 万亿，采用统一自回归架构进行原生全模态建模，支持文本、图像、音频、视频等多模态输入与输出。

According to reports, Wenxin 5.0 excels in multi-modal understanding, instruction following, creative writing, factuality, agent planning, and tool application. 据介绍，文心 5.0 在多模态理解、指令遵循、创意写作、事实性、智能体规划与工具应用等方面表现突出。

In over 40 authoritative benchmark tests, its language and multi-modal understanding capabilities are on par with models like Gemini-2.5-Pro and GPT-5-High, while its image and video generation capabilities have reached a globally leading level. 在 40 余项权威基准测试中，其语言与多模态理解能力与 Gemini-2.5-Pro、GPT-5-High 等模型持平，图像与视频生成能力达到全球领先水平。

Previously, on November 8, the latest rankings from the LMArena large model arena showed that ERNIE-5.0-Preview-1022 ranked tied for second globally and first in China in text task evaluations. 此前， 11 月 8 日，LMArena 大模型竞技场最新排名显示，ERNIE-5.0-Preview-1022 在文本任务评测中位列全球并列第二、中国第一。

Baidu founder Robin Li stated at the conference: "Intelligence itself is the biggest application, and the speed of technological iteration is the only moat. Baidu will continue to invest in R&D to push up the ceiling of intelligence." 百度创始人李彦宏在会上表示：「智能本身是最大的应用，而技术迭代速度是唯一护城河。百度会持续投入研发，推高智能天花板。」

Baidu CTO Wang Haifeng pointed out that Wenxin 5.0 differs from most multi-modal models in the industry that use post-fusion. Instead, it integrates data such as language, images, video, and audio from the beginning of training, achieving native full-modal unified understanding and generation. 百度 CTO 王海峰则指出，文心 5.0 不同于业界多数采用后期融合的多模态模型，而是从训练开始便融合语言、图像、视频、音频等数据，实现原生的全模态统一理解与生成。

Currently, the Wenxin Large Model 5.0 Preview is available on the Wenxin App, and developers and enterprise users can call API services through the Baidu Qianfan platform. 目前，文心大模型 5.0 Preview 已上线文心 App，开发者与企业用户可通过百度千帆平台调用 API 服务。

item.title: CASETiFY 携手 Care Bears 推出首个联名系列
item.guid: CASETiFY-携手-Care-Bears-推出首个联名系列
item.description:
CASETiFY announced its first collaboration series with the classic character brand Care Bears, integrating Care Bears' iconic rainbow, cloud, and star elements into tech-fashion designs to create accessories that blend nostalgia with modern sensibility. CASETiFY 宣布携手经典角色品牌 Care Bears 推出首个联名系列，将 Care Bears 标志性的彩虹、云朵与星星元素融入科技潮流设计，打造兼具怀旧与现代感的配件产品。

This collaboration series features four themed sets: the Nostalgic Bears Set, Star Dream Bears Set, Character Exclusive Set, and Bear Family Photo Collection Set, covering various tech accessories such as phone cases and magnetic card holder stands. 本次联名系列共推出四款主题套组，包括怀旧熊熊套组、星梦熊熊套组、角色专属套组以及熊熊全家福收藏套组，覆盖手机壳、磁吸卡包支架等多种科技配件。

In addition to regular products, the series also simultaneously launched blind boxes for phone doll charms, with some lucky users having the chance to win limited special edition Happy Bear charms. 除常规产品外，系列还同步上线手机玩偶挂件盲盒，部分幸运用户有机会获得限量特别版开心熊挂件。

Furthermore, CASETiFY offers personalized customization services, allowing users to upload photos or enter text to create unique, exclusive accessories. The brand also launched "Mix & Match" sets, enabling consumers to freely combine items based on their personal aesthetics and functional needs, further strengthening the brand's differentiated positioning in the trendy tech accessories market. 此外，CASETiFY 提供个性化定制服务，用户可上传照片或输入文字，打造独一无二的专属配件。官方同时推出随心搭配套组，允许消费者根据个人美学与功能需求自由组合，进一步强化品牌在潮流科技配件市场的差异化定位。

The series will officially launch next Monday (November 17) on the CASETiFY official website, mini-programs, and offline stores. 该系列将于下周一（11 月 17 日）正式登陆 CASETiFY 官网、小程序和线下门店。

item.title: 茉莉奶白携手线条小狗打造冬季联名企划
item.guid: 茉莉奶白携手线条小狗打造冬季联名企划
item.description:
Yesterday, tea beverage brand Jasmine Milk White announced a collaboration project with the popular Korean IP "Line Dog," launching the "Molly Doggy, the Dog Manager" series of activities. 昨天，茶饮品牌茉莉奶白宣布与韩国热门 IP「线条小狗」展开联名企划，推出「小狗主理人 Molly Doggy」系列活动。

This collaboration encompasses limited-edition beverage development, themed store creation, merchandise launch, and charitable initiatives. The Line Dog is given the role of "Modern Tea Shop Manager" in this collaboration, unlocking multiple roles such as tea master, store manager, and staff, thereby strengthening the brand narrative. 此次合作涵盖限定饮品研发、主题门店打造、周边产品上线及公益行动。线条小狗在此次合作中被赋予「摩登茶铺主理人」身份，解锁调茶师、店长、店员等多重角色，强化品牌叙事。

Centered around this identity, Jasmine Milk White launched two limited-edition beverages: "Earl Grey Cookie" and "Tiramisu Cookie Milk Tea." Visually, the brand updated its entire packaging with a "Modern Cowboy" theme, creating exclusive uniforms and limited-edition packaging for the Line Dog. 围绕这一身份，茉莉奶白推出两款限定饮品：「伯爵饼干」与「提拉米苏饼干奶茶」。视觉层面，品牌以「摩登牛仔」为主题更新全套包材，为线条小狗打造专属制服与限定包装。

Additionally, the brand partnered with "It Foundation" to launch the "Retired Working Dog Care Program." From November 13 to 28, 0.1 RMB will be donated for every co-branded beverage sold, to be used for the care and adoption promotion of retired working dogs. Concurrently, Jasmine Milk White plans to release a public service documentary focusing on search and rescue dogs, guide dogs, and therapy dogs, calling on the public to pay attention to retired dog groups. 此外，品牌携手它基金发起「退役工作犬照护计划」。11 月 13 日至 28 日期间，每售出一杯联名饮品即捐赠 0.1 元，用于退役工作犬的照护与领养推广。同时，茉莉奶白还计划推出聚焦搜救犬、导盲犬、疗愈犬的公益纪录片，呼吁公众关注退役犬群体。

item.title: 泡泡玛特携手 Harrods 推出 SKULLPANDA 奇幻下午茶
item.guid: 泡泡玛特携手-Harrods-推出-SKULLPANDA-奇幻下午茶
item.description:
According to SocialBeta, Pop Mart and the globally renowned department store Harrods launched the SKULLPANDA Table Series Afternoon Tea at the Harrods Tea Room in Shanghai, embracing the holiday season with a cross-industry collaboration. The afternoon tea series will hold its opening ceremony today and officially go online tomorrow. 据 SocialBeta 报道，泡泡玛特与全球知名百货 Harrods 在上海哈罗德茶室推出 SKULLPANDA 餐桌系列下午茶，以跨界形式迎接节日季。该系列下午茶将在今天举行启幕仪式，明天正式上线。

The event unfolds around a three-act structure of "Chaos," "Collaboration," and "Symbiosis," continuing SKULLPANDA's narrative imagination. Characters such as "The Balance of Twins," "The Escape of the Sugar Cube," and "The Silent Guard of the Napkin" transform identities across multiple spacetimes, echoing the concept of "Boundless Imagery." 活动围绕「混沌」「协作」「共生」三幕结构展开，延续 SKULLPANDA 的叙事想象。角色如「双生的制衡」「方糖的落跑」「餐巾的默守」在多重时空中变换身份，呼应其「无垠之象」的概念。

In terms of dining design, the clash of flavors in cocktails and savory dishes symbolizes secrets beneath a sweet facade, while Harrods' classic scones paired with homemade jam and clotted cream embody a taste philosophy of fun and symbiosis. The tea room space is decorated with burgundy drapes, silver candelabras, and art installations, transforming it into a festive fantasy theater, where guests experience the story's progression with desserts, guided by a voiceover. 餐饮设计方面，鸡尾酒与咸点的风味碰撞象征甜美表象下的秘密，哈罗德经典司康搭配自制果酱与凝脂奶油，体现趣味与共生的味觉哲学。茶室空间以酒红色幕布、银色烛台和艺术装置布置成节日幻想剧场，宾客在画外音引导下伴随甜点体验故事递进。

The official statement claims that this collaboration combines trendy toy culture with the British afternoon tea tradition, reshaping a sense of ritual from an artistic perspective and highlighting the extensibility of cross-industry marketing in the lifestyle domain. 官方称，此次合作将潮玩文化与英伦下午茶传统结合，以艺术化视角重塑仪式感，凸显跨界营销在生活方式领域的延展性。

item.title: 《超级马力欧银河大电影》预告发布
item.guid: 《超级马力欧银河大电影》预告发布
item.description:
Illumination Entertainment and Nintendo jointly produced "The Super Mario Galaxy Movie," which released a new trailer yesterday. This work is a sequel to "The Super Mario Bros. Movie," which previously grossed 1.3 billion USD globally, becoming a phenomenal work in animation history. 照明娱乐与任天堂联合制作的《超级马力欧银河大电影》昨日发布全新预告片。这部作品是《超级马力欧兄弟大电影》的续作，前作曾在全球斩获 13 亿美元票房，成为动画影史现象级作品。

The film continues Mario's adventure and introduces more classic characters, including Bowser Jr., Bowser's son, and Princess Rosalina, the guardian of the observatory. The story revolves around the father-son duo's comeback journey and galactic battles, with fully upgraded visual effects and immersive experience. The new film is expected to be released in North America on April 3, 2026. 影片延续马力欧的冒险旅程，并引入更多经典角色，包括酷霸之子「酷霸 Jr.」与天文台守护者「罗莎塔公主」。故事围绕父子档的逆袭之路与银河战斗展开，视觉效果与沉浸体验全面升级。新片预计将于 2026 年 4 月 3 日在北美上映。

item.title: 《死亡搁浅》新作动画《ISOLATIONS》制作启动，将登陆 Disney+
item.guid: 《死亡搁浅》新作动画《ISOLATIONS》制作启动，将登陆-Disney+
item.description:
Yesterday, Kojima Productions officially announced a new animated work in the "Death Stranding" series, "DEATH STRANDING ISOLATIONS (tentative title)," at the "Disney+ Originals Preview 2025" event held at the Hong Kong Disneyland Hotel Convention Center. This work is expected to be exclusively available on Disney+ Star in 2027. 昨天，小岛工作室在香港迪士尼乐园酒店会议中心举行的「Disney+ Originals Preview 2025」活动上，正式公布了《死亡搁浅（Death Stranding）》系列全新动画作品《DEATH STRANDING ISOLATIONS（暂定名）》。该作品预计将于 2027 年在 Disney+ Star 独家上线。

This work is positioned as a cross-media expansion of "Death Stranding," continuing the game's worldview and telling a new story. The official concept visuals showcase young male and female characters, as well as several items and devices from the game. The story background continues the "Death Stranding" phenomenon, depicting the isolation and attempts at reconstruction by survivors after the collapse of human civilization. 本作定位为《死亡搁浅》的跨媒体拓展，延续游戏世界观，讲述全新故事。官方公布的概念视觉展示了少年与少女角色，以及多件游戏中出现的道具与装置。故事背景延续「死亡搁浅」现象，描绘人类文明崩塌后幸存者的孤立与重建尝试。

Regarding the production team, game director Hideo Kojima will serve as executive producer, with animation production handled by the emerging Japanese studio E&H production. The director will be Takayuki Sano of E&H production, who has long followed and paid tribute to Hideo Kojima's works. 制作阵容方面，游戏导演小岛秀夫将担任执行制片人，动画制作由日本新锐工作室 E&H production 负责。导演则由 E&H production 的佐野誉幸担纲，他长期关注并致敬小岛秀夫的作品。

item.title: 《惊天魔盗团 3》今日上映
item.guid: 《惊天魔盗团-3》今日上映
item.description:
The magic crime film "Now You See Me 3" officially premiered in mainland China today. 魔术犯罪题材影片《惊天魔盗团 3》今天在中国内地正式上映。

The film continues the series' consistent high-energy narrative and magic scene design, with the entire Horsemen team returning to orchestrate a new heist centered around "the most expensive diamond in history." 影片延续系列一贯的高能叙事与魔术场景设计，骑士团全员回归，围绕「史上最贵钻石」展开全新骗局。

The production team incorporated classic magic scenes such as rotating staircases, mirror houses, and illusion rooms into the visual effects, and enhanced the immersive experience with one-shot filming. The exclusive Chinese poster adopts an oriental scroll design, combining images of cranes, rocks, forests, and clouds to further highlight the cultural fusion. 制作团队在视觉效果上融入旋转阶梯、镜子屋、错觉房间等经典魔术场景，并以一镜到底的拍摄方式强化沉浸感。中国独家海报采用东方卷轴设计，结合仙鹤、山石、林木与云雾意象，进一步凸显文化融合特色。

Director Ruben Fleischer pointed out in an interview that the film draws inspiration from traditional Chinese magic, with ancient Chinese magic tricks like "Three Immortals Returning to the Cave" and shadow play elements appearing in the trailer, all reflecting the cross-cultural collision of Eastern and Western magic. 导演鲁本 · 弗雷斯彻在采访中指出，影片从中国传统魔术中汲取灵感，预告片中出现的古彩戏法「三仙归洞」与皮影戏元素，均体现了中西魔术的跨文化碰撞。
